backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short descriptive summaries of their purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining global CSS variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root div and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application assembling all site sections including Store and Vote.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section showing Discord and community info pulled from siteConfig.
Displays feature cards using icons and data from siteConfig.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with quick-scroll links, server info, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner with server branding, background image, and join button.
frontend/src/components/HowToJoinSection: Step-by-step join guide with copy-to-clipboard server address functionality.
frontend/src/components/RulesSection.tsx: Displays server rules from siteConfig with numbered cards and an important notice block.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Provides the main page layout with navigation, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Renders a responsive navigation bar with smooth-scroll links and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/StoreSection.tsx: Shows store info and a card linking to the store or a 'Coming Soon' button based on config.
frontend/src/components/VoteSection.tsx: Lists vote links with enabled/disabled states and descriptions pulled from siteConfig.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting that backend queries are not used.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme variables with a Minecraft-inspired palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/siteConfig.ts: Holds site-wide configuration including server info, store, vote links, rules, and feature lists.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors using CSS variables, extended theme settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architectural notes, known issues, and feature definitions for the Cooper SMP website build.
